    <div class="l-content-home">
     <div class="home__col home__col--1">
      <h1 class="h1">
       Doylestown Health
      </h1>
      <div class="rtf home__intro">
       <h2>
        Doylestown Hospital
       </h2>
       <p>
        A part of the Doylestown Health System, Doylestown Hospital's award-winning services and expert physicians are located in the heart of Bucks County, PA.
       </p>
       <a class="link-more" href="/locations/doylestown-hospital">
        Learn more about Doylestown Hospital in Bucks County, PA
       </a>
       <h2>
        Health and Wellness Center
       </h2>
       <p>
        Doylestown Health offers a convenient outpatient location in Warrington, PA, that includes the
        <a href="/locations/doylestown-hospital-surgery-center">
         Doylestown Hospital Surgery Center
        </a>
        , physician offices, diagnostic imaging, laboratory services, and more.
       </p>
       <p>
        <a class="link-more" href="/locations/health-and-wellness-center">
         Learn more about the Health and Wellness Center
        </a>
       </p>
       <h2>
        Doylestown Health Physicians
       </h2>
       <p>
        As physicians employed by Doylestown Health, these members of our care team offer a variety of primary and specialty care services.
       </p>
       <p>
        <a class="link-more" href="/medical-services/doylestown-health-physicians">
         Learn more about Doylestown Health Physicians
        </a>
       </p>
       <h2>
        Doylestown Health Urgent Care
       </h2>
       <p>
        Staffed by Doylestown Health physicians and connected seamlessly to Doylestown Health medical records, Urgent Care  is open 365 days a year to treat minor illness and injury. Reserve an appointment or walk-in, no appointment needed.
       </p>
       <p>
        <a class="link-more" href="/urgent-care">
         Learn more about Doylestown Health Urgent Care
        </a>
       </p>
       <h2>
        Doylestown Hospital Home Health and Hospice
       </h2>
       <p>
        Doylestown Hospital Home Health and Hospice provides a range of services, programs, and counseling and are committed to providing excellence in care to all in need. Learn more about
        <a href="/medical-services/home-health">
         Home Health
        </a>
        and
        <a href="/medical-services/hospice">
         Hospice
        </a>
        .
       </p>
       <h2>
        Pine Run Retirement Community
       </h2>
       <p>
        Owned and operated by Doylestown Health,
        <a href="http://pinerun.org/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
         Pine Run Retirement Community
        </a>
        offers access to
        <a href="http://pinerun.org/independent-living/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
         Retirement Living
        </a>
        ,
        <a href="http://pinerun.org/personal-care-at-lakeview/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
         Personal Care
        </a>
        ,
        <a href="http://pinerun.org/the-garden/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
         Alzheimers/Dementia Care
        </a>
        . In addition, Doylestown Health's
        <a href="http://pinerun.org/health-care/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
         Pine Run Health Center
        </a>
        offers a nursing, post-operative care, rehabilitation services and long-term care.
       </p>
